```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
```

First we read the data in using `read_csv`.

```{r data-read-in, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, cache = TRUE}
gapminder <- read_csv("data/gapminder.csv")
```

# lifespan

Now we can look at the lifespan

```{r hist-life-exp}
summary(gapminder$lifeExp)
```
